title: Bontexkenzy
author: Bontexkenzy
content: Wow, I'm so excited about the recent court trials of the Paris killing that took place in 2015 killing about 130 people, the highest number since after the world war 2.    Salah abdeslam and other 19 offendant has been charged to several jail terms.only Abdeslam has given sentence to live in prison, others are jail terms ranging from 15 to 35years jail terms.Among the 19 terrorist,6 are reported to be dead.Looking at the outcome of the court trials of the killers of More than 130 people in Paris,has justice been done?

comments.author: Moneyprism
comments.body: there is no justice in a case like this.. if the death of these terrorists can resurrect 130 people who died then it is called "justice".. the death of these terrorists is only to reduce the number of criminals and will not erase the wounds caused by their actions
